title: N.B. COVID-19 roundup: Plan to keep learning going for rest of the school year not final
description: The New Brunswick Department of Education is working on a possible virtual learning plan for students during the COVID-19 outbreak, according to two district superintendents, but it's not clear when the public will find out about it.
content: The New Brunswick Department of Education is working on a possible virtual learning plan for students during the COVID outbreak according to two district superintendents but it s not clear when the public will find out about it All public schools close chars
